entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, who is trying to retrieve a sword from a pool.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and experienced wizard who had previously told Harry about the qualities of a Gryffindor.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: One of the four houses at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, known for their bravery and daring.

entities.name: sword
entities.description: A magical sword that is stuck in a pool and can only be retrieved by a true Gryffindor.

entities.name: pool
entities.description: A frozen body of water where the sword is stuck.

entities.name: forest
entities.description: The surrounding area where Harry was walking alone when he spotted the sword through the ice.

relationships.description: Harry is trying to determine if he has the qualities of a Gryffindor, which are bravery and daring.
Dumbledore previously told Harry about the qualities that define a Gryffindor.
